summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Campaign Landing Page Builder feature. All backend APIs (16/16 tests passed) and frontend UI components are working correctly. The landing page builder allows brands to edit slug, CTA text, hero image, HTML content (via visual/code editor), testimonials, and FAQs. Public campaign landing page renders HTML content correctly via dangerouslySetInnerHTML.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Campaign Landing Page Builder feature is fully functional. Backend has PUT /api/v1/campaigns/:id/landing-page (brand auth required) and GET /api/v1/public/campaigns/:slug (public). Frontend has LandingPageBuilder.js at /brand/campaigns/:id/landing-page and CampaignLandingPage.js at /campaigns/:slug. All landing page fields (slug, CTA text, hero image, HTML content, testimonials, FAQs) are editable and persist correctly.
